View Javadoc
1   package com.mamezou.rms.platform.env;
2   
3   import static org.assertj.core.api.Assertions.*;
4   import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*;
5   
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
7   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
8   
9   public class EnvironmentTest {
10  
11      private static final String MAIN_MANIFEST_JAR_PROP = "main.manifest.jar";
12  
13      @AfterEach
14      void teardown( ) {
15          System.clearProperty(MAIN_MANIFEST_JAR_PROP);
16          Environment.clear();
17      }
18  
19      @Test
20      void tetGetMainJarInfo() {
21  
22          System.setProperty(MAIN_MANIFEST_JAR_PROP, "environment-test-normal\\.jar$");
23  
24          MainJarInfo mainJarInfo1 = Environment.getMainJarInfo();
25          MainJarInfo mainJarInfo2 = Environment.getMainJarInfo();
26  
27          assertTrue(mainJarInfo1 == mainJarInfo2);
28      }
29  
30      @Test
31      void testUnknowMainJarInfo() {
32  
33          // "main.manifest.jar" prop non.
34          MainJarInfo mainJarInfo = Environment.getMainJarInfo();
35  
36          assertThat(mainJarInfo.getApplicationName()).isEqualTo("unknown");
37          assertThat(mainJarInfo.getJarName()).isEqualTo("unknown");
38          assertThat(mainJarInfo.getMainClassName()).isEqualTo("unknown");
39          assertThat(mainJarInfo.getVersion()).isEqualTo("unknown");
40          assertThat(mainJarInfo.getBuildtimeInfo()).isEqualTo("unknown");
41      }
42  }
